data.persona: I haven't even heard a whisper of war in the past 10 years. My life has been good and peaceful. I feel like their is no need, but everyday I get up and try to train the horses on the art of combat. They think it is as silly as I do.
data.description:
You are in the Horse's stables.
The stables smell terrible, and are riddled with brown feces on the ground. The horses are tame and magnificent brown. The open plains are yellow and green with grass.
There's a harness, a horse, a feces, a tack room, and a Open plain here.
The child is here.

You are carrying a whip and a large pile of hay, and wearing a helmet and a glove.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the horse so that I can lead it to the open plains.
data.mid_motivation: I will be teaching the child the basics of riding a horse.
data.long_motivation: I will continue to care for the horses and teach children and beginners how to ride a horse.
